biomech 0.1.0
  • Reference

Optimize bending parameters

optimize_bend.Rd

Optimize the elastic_modulus, the shear_modulus or both using observations.

optimize_bend(
  field_data,
  elastic_modulus = c(1, 100, 10000),
  shear_modulus = c(1, 1000, 10000),
  type = c("all", "bending", "torsion"),
  tol = .Machine$double.eps^0.25,
  ...
)

Arguments

field_data

Field data (data.frame of x, y and z coordinates of the points)
elastic_modulus

Elasticity modulus (bending, MPa) vector: c(min,start,max)
shear_modulus

Shear modulus (torsion, MPa) vector: c(min,start,max)
type

Type of optimization (either "bending","torsion" or "all")
tol

Tolerance for optimization accuracy
...

Further parameters to pass to bend()

Value

The optimized values

Details

The minimim and maximum values are not used when a parameter is not optimized, but they still should be provided by the user though.

Examples

file_path = system.file("extdata/6_EW01.22_17_kanan.txt", package = "biomech")
field_data = read_mat(file_path)
# optimize_bend(field_data, type = "all")
# Gives:
# $elastic_modulus
# [1] 1209.396
# $shear_modulus
# [1] 67.44096
